```{r}
data("ChickWeight")
Diets = table(ChickWeight$Diet)

plot1 = barplot(Diets,
                xlim = c(0,250),
                horiz = T)
text(Diets,
     plot1,
     Diets,
     cex=0.8,
     pos=4)

```

```{r}
library(RColorBrewer)

plot(faithful$eruptions ~ faithful$waiting,
     ylab = "Eruption time",
     xlab = "Waiting Time",
     ylim = c(1,6),
     las = 1,
     col=brewer.pal(8,"Dark2"))

abline(lm(faithful$eruptions ~ faithful$waiting),
       col="#F52222",
       lty=3,
       lwd=3)

```
